Description: This is a full-time on-site role located in Dubai, United Arab Emirates for a Real Estate Admin / Personal Assistant. The Real Estate Admin / Personal Assistant will be responsible for providing administrative support to the company's real estate deals. Daily tasks include processing paperwork, coordinating meetings, and answering phone calls and emails.Skills
Skills:
High school diploma or equivalent. Associates Degree in Business Administration or related field preferred
3+ years of experience in administrative support, preferably in real estate
Strong knowledge of Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, and PowerPoint)
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to handle multiple tasks and work independently in a fast-paced environment
Knowledge of Dubai real estate regulations is a plus
